title: Women Are Not Without Power
description: Even though it's summer, there's a lot to catch up on in the legal world! Leah and Melissa talk with Grace Panetta, who co-wrote a piece for Business Insider on the GOP's plans for state constitutional conventions. And then they turn toward Kansas, where voters dramatically turned out to declare that reproductive freedom is an essential part of the state constitution. They're joined by several of the activists behind the victory.
author: hey@crooked.com (leah litman, melissa murray, sollie flora, grace panetta, rachel sweet, helena buchmann)

They're joined by several of the activists behind the victory.
